oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The RAPUNZEL TURKEY PROJECT
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Altmann, Barbara
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social aspects
Education, extension and communication
Country reports
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: European Demand for organic dried fruits and nuts - Turkish Organic Cultivation “Cultural quality” of an organic product. Rapunzel tries to show it’s experience with organic food/organic farmers/organic farming practices in Turkey.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Altmann, Barbara (2014) The RAPUNZEL TURKEY PROJECT. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
